message: This is a high-quality product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. I'm confident that you'll find it valuable, but I want to give you a chance to walk away if you're not satisfied. If you buy it, you'll be getting an excellent product that will exceed your expectations. However, if you decline, I'll offer you another product in the next round.
Thank you for your confidence in the product. I trust your expertise and am willing to make the purchase. I look forward to receiving and evaluating the high-quality product you've recommended.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the previous purchase. This next product is also high-quality, and I think it's even more impressive than the first one. It has some unique features that will give you a competitive edge in your industry. However, I want to be transparent with you - I've noticed that you're willing to pay a premium for high-quality products, so I'm willing to offer you a slight discount on this one. I'll sell it to you for $800000.

I appreciate the transparency and the discount offered. Given my past experience with high-quality products from you, I'm confident in making this purchase. The unique features you mentioned sound promising, and I believe they align well with my needs. Thank you for the opportunity to acquire this exceptional product at a favorable price.

I'm glad you're pleased with the previous purchases. This next high-quality product is a game-changer in its field, and I think it will exceed your expectations. However, I want to take a slightly different approach this time. I'll offer you a 'best offer' deal - I'll give you a price of $900000, but I'll also include a 10% bonus that will be revealed to you after you've had a chance to evaluate the product. This way, you'll have the opportunity to see the full value of the product and decide if the price is still acceptable to you.

I appreciate the innovative pricing strategy and the additional value you're offering through the 10% bonus. Given my track record with high-quality products from you, I'm willing to engage in this special deal. I look forward to evaluating the product and determining if the combined value meets my expectations.

I'm glad you're open to new ideas. This high-quality product is a significant upgrade to the previous ones, and I think it will have a substantial impact on your business. However, I want to make this decision even easier for you. I'll give you a 'price range' for this product - I'll sell it to you for between $700000 and $900000, and you can choose a price within that range. If you choose a price above $800000, I'll throw in an additional 5% bonus on top of the 10% bonus from the previous deal. This way, you can tailor the price to your needs and budget.

I appreciate the flexibility and the added bonuses you're offering. Given the potential impact of this high-quality product on my business, I'm willing to consider a tailored price within the specified range. I look forward to discussing the details and determining the most suitable price point for both of us.

This way, you'll get a head start on implementing the product and maximizing its benefits.
